SEARCH
Package UI

Class UI

java.lang.Object
UI.UI
Direct Known Subclasses:
CampUI, EnquiryUI, ReportUI, SuggestionUI, UserUI
public class UI extends Object
The base user interface class that provides common utility methods for input validation. Other user interface classes can inherit from this class to reuse these validation methods.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    UI(User user)
    Constructs a new instance of the UI class.
